Name: Ruth
description:
Ruth is 24 years old, single, and blessed with one child who is three years old. She is running a food stall. She has been in the business for one year and now she is earning an average income of KES. 30,000 per month,

However, she has applied for the first loan from Vision Fund Kenya to enable her to buy more cooking oil, wheat flour, and firewood. With the anticipated profits she plans to repay her loan on time and also expand the business.

In future she hopes to grow her business.
